snippet.title: Lily Fantasia - Fantasia Sonata God Dance by PYKAMIA vs. sakuzyo
snippet.description:
《Lily Fantasia》is a PC rhythm game currently under development by Wiseye Studio!

Let's go on a musically magical journey, with a magical piano!

Join our Discord NOW to join the beta test of Lily Fantasia (Yes, you can try it out RIGHT NOW!)
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/Qyt3YSxzDw

Follow us on Social Media!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2527300
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LilyFantasiaOfficial
Twitter (JP): https://twitter.com/lilyfantasia_jp
Twitter (EN): https://twitter.com/lilyfantasia_en
